item.title: Christmas
item.description: On the way to become our best selves, we make good choices, bad choices, and that’s normal. Yet something very specific made me shiver, it felt wrong.GiveWell, Fairtrade, Fairphone, fantastic concept to find a significantly better way to help in their respective domain. Donating money, buying such stuff are commendable actions. Or are they?While it is obvious that these alternatives are better than many others in many aspects, should we be thanked for a donation?
